StoryDesc: On this very day, humanity opens the epic chapter of reclaiming the night.
Unwilling to be enslaved in the Sanctuary, choosing only to reign in hell.
The avenger falls victim to their enemy, collapsing in defeat upon the scorching earth.
Bloodsworn, why have you gotten mixed up in this war?
The cowboys stride forward, heading toward the places that need courage and kindness the most.
Get to the barricades and prepare for battle!
The miracle from thirty years past transcends time, descending once more upon humanity.
For those who crave conflict, war is simply right. For those who have given up all hope, war makes perfect sense.
She knows the days of chasing pain are back.
The vengeance-seeker, fresh off the train, crosses the Acheron River and plunges into the hell beneath the Scorched Borderland.
Ever wonder what's on the other side of death?
At that moment, the crimson sun sinks below the horizon, forever imprinted in her eyes, which refuse to close.
She realizes the Laws of Life and Death are like a train on a continuous loop, its beginning and end forever intertwined.
That thing everyone else is after... why can't I ever get a clear look at it?
I return ashes to ashes, dust to dust. I send what belongs to the mortal realm back to the mortal realm, and what belongs to hell back to hell. Every soul deserves to die with dignity.
Years later, a silent "plague doctor" walks to the middle of the road.
He purges the poison from this world with a new name.
What did you see in the long dream, Bloodsworn?
Ready to remember everything?
The child returns to the place where he was born.
Survival itself is the longest plague of all.
The day she walked out of Lucky 38 Casino was Christmas Eve, too.
As long as the chips remain on the table, the game never truly ends.
Eleanor, don't let your ambition grow larger than your abilities.
Everything... must bow to my desires.

StoryTitle: Yearning for the End: Part I
StoryDesc: All desires cycle endlessly here, like a Mobius strip with no beginning or end.

StoryTitle: Yearning for the End: Part II
StoryDesc: All desires cycle endlessly here, like a Mobius strip with no beginning or end.
I will honor this wager, even if you never understand what this deal truly means.
